00096         public function POMPage($title, $text, $parsers = array('POMExtendedParser'))
00097         {
00098                 $this->title = $title;
00099                 $this->text = $text;
00100                 $this->children =  new DLList();
00101                 $this->children->setShortcutTypes(array(
00102                         'POMTemplate',
00103                         'POMAskFunction',
00104                         'POMBuiltInParserFunction',
00105                         'POMExtensionParserFunction',
00106                         'POMCategory', 
00107                         'POMProperty', 
00108                         'POMSimpleText'));
00109 
00110                 foreach ($parsers as $parser)
00111                 {
00112                         $__parserObj = call_user_func(array($parser, 'getParser'));
00113                         $__parserObj->Parse($this);
00114                 }
00115         }

00117         /* Constructs the POM using a PCPPage object.
00118          * In the constructor the supported element types are set. If an element is added and
00119          * it is not in the list of the supported elemens, a "Object of class DLList could not be converted to string " exception is thrown.
00120          *
00121          * @param PCPPage $pcpPageObj
00122          * @param string[] $parsers
00123          * @return POMPage
00124          */
00125         public static function fromPCPPage(PCPPage $pcpPageObj = NULL, $parsers = array('POMExtendedParser'))
00126         {
00127                 $__pomPage = new POMPage("", "", array());
00128                 $__pomPage->title = $pcpPageObj->title;
00129                 $__pomPage->text = $pcpPageObj->text;
00130                 $__pomPage->pageid = $pcpPageObj->pageid;
00131                 $__pomPage->namespace = $pcpPageObj->namespace;
00132                 $__pomPage->summary = $pcpPageObj->summary;
00133                 $__pomPage->basetimestamp = $pcpPageObj->basetimestamp;
00134                 $__pomPage->lastrevid = $pcpPageObj->lastrevid;
00135                 $__pomPage->usedrevid = $pcpPageObj->usedrevid;
00136                 
00137                 
00138                 $__pomPage->children =  new DLList();
00139                 $__pomPage->children->setShortcutTypes(array(
00140                         'POMTemplate',
00141                         'POMAskFunction',
00142                         'POMBuiltInParserFunction',
00143                         'POMExtensionParserFunction',
00144                         'POMCategory', 
00145                         'POMProperty', 
00146                         'POMSimpleText'));
00147 
00148                 foreach ($parsers as $parser)
00149                 {
00150                         $__parserObj = call_user_func(array($parser, 'getParser'));
00151                         $__parserObj->Parse($__pomPage);
00152                 }
00153                 return $__pomPage;
00154         }
00160         public function getNamespace(){
00161                 $__start = strpos($this->title, ':');
00162                 return substr($this->title, 0, $__start);
00163         }

00170         public function addElement(POMElement &$element){
00171                 $this->addElementAtPosition($element);

00190         public function addElementAtPosition(POMElement &$element, $position = -1)
00191         {
00192                 if($position === -1){
00193                         $this->children->add($element);
00194                         return true;
00195                 }else{
00196                         $__searchResult = array();
00197                         $__oldNode = NULL; // the exiting element at the requested position
00198                         $__charCount = 0; // the number of chars before this element
00199 
00200                         $__searchResult = $this->searchInTextAtPosition($position);
00201                         $__oldNode = &$__searchResult[0];
00202                         $__charCount = $__searchResult[1];
00203 
00204                         #var_dump($__oldNode->element);
00205 
00206                         switch (get_class($__oldNode->element)){
00207                                 case 'POMTemplate':
00208                                         if ( strcmp('POMTemplate', get_class($element)) === 0){ // types match
00209                                                 // perhaps allow adding a template into a template ...
00210                                                 return false;
00211                                         }else{ // types mismatch
00212                                                 return false;
00213                                         }
00214                                         break;
00215                                 case 'POMCategory':
00216                                         if ( strcmp('POMCategory', get_class($element)) === 0){ // types match
00217                                                 $__oldNode->element = $element;
00218                                                 return false;
00219                                         }else{ // types mismatch
00220                                                 return false;
00221                                         }
00222                                         break;
00223                                 case 'POMProperty' :
00224                                         if ( strcmp('POMProperty', get_class($element)) === 0){ // types match
00225                                                 $__oldNode->element = &$element;
00226                                                 return false;
00227                                         }else{ // types mismatch
00228                                                 return false;
00229                                         }
00230                                         break;
00231                                 case 'POMSimpleText':
00232                                         if ( strcmp('POMSimpleText', get_class($element)) === 0){ // types match
00233                                                 // don't split the node, just add the text
00234                                                 $__relativePosition = $position - $__charCount;
00235                                                 $__stringBeforePos = substr($__oldNode->element->nodeText, 0, $__relativePosition);
00236                                                 $__stringAfterPos = substr($__oldNode->element->nodeText, $__relativePosition+1);
00237                                                 $__oldNode->element->nodeText = $__stringBeforePos.$element->nodeText.$__stringAfterPos;
00238 
00239                                                 return true;
00240                                         }else{ // types mismatch
00241                                                 $__relativePosition = $position - $__charCount;
00242                                                 $__stringBeforePos = substr($__oldNode->element->nodeText, 0, $__relativePosition);
00243                                                 $__stringAfterPos = substr($__oldNode->element->nodeText, $__relativePosition+1);
00244 
00245                                                 $__oldNode->element->nodeText =$__stringBeforePos;
00246                                                 $__oldNodePosInList = $this->children->getPosition($__oldNode->element);
00247 
00248 
00249                                                 // add the new node and the rest of teh old node as a new node
00250                                                 $this->children->addAtPosition($__oldNodePosInList+1, $element);
00251                                                 $this->children->addAtPosition($__oldNodePosInList+2, new POMSimpleText($__stringAfterPos));
00252                                                         
00253                                                 return true;
00254                                         }
00255                                         break;
00256                                 default:
00257                                         return false; // unsupported POMElement
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 return false;
00262         }

00272         public function addElementBefore(POMElement  &$oldElement, POMElement  &$newElement){
00273                 return $this->children->addAtPosition($this->children->getPosition($oldElement), &$newElement);
00274         }
00275 
00284         public function addElementAfter(POMElement  $oldElement, POMElement  &$newElement){
00285                 return $this->children->addAtPosition($this->children->getPosition($oldElement)+1, $newElement);
00286         }

00288         /* Retrieve an element on a page
00289          *
00290          * @param string $id The ID of the element.
00291          *
00292          * @return POMElement The element.
00293          */
00294         public function &getElement($id = NULL){
00295                 $__iterator = $this->children->listIterator();
00296                 if($id !== NULL){
00297                         while($__iterator->hasNext()){
00298                                 $__element = &$__iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00299                                 if( strcmp($__element->id, $id) === 0){
00300                                         return $__element;
00301                                 }
00302                         }
00303                         return NULL;
00304                 }else{
00305                         return $__iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00306                 }
00307         }

00362         public function &getTemplateByTitle($title = '', $type = 'POMTemplate'){
00363                 $__resultingArray = new DLList();
00364                 $__iterator = $this->children->shortcutsListIterator($type);
00365                 if($title !== ''){
00366                         while($__iterator->hasNext()){

00529         public function sync(){
00530                 $__iterator = $this->children->listIterator();
00531                 $this->text = '';
00532                 while($__iterator->hasNext()){
00533                         $__element = $__iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00534                         $this->text .= $__element->toString();
00535                 }
00536                 return true;
00537         }
00538 
00545         public function searchInTextAtPosition($textPos = -1){
00546                 $__charCount = 0;
00547                 if(!$this->children->isEmpty()){
00548                         $__node = &$this->children->head;
00549                         for($__i=0; $i<=$this->children->size(); $__i++){
00550                                 $__node = &$__node->getNext();
00551                                 $__charCount+= strlen($__node->element->nodeText);
00552                                 if ($__charCount >= $textPos){
00553                                         return array(&$__node,$__charCount-strlen($__node->element->nodeText));
00554                                 }
00555                         }
00556                 }
00557                 return NULL;
00558         }
00559 
00567         public function &update(POMElement $element = NULL){
00568                 $__iterator = $this->children->listIterator();
00569                 if($element->id !== NULL){
00570                         while($__iterator->hasNext()){
00571                                 $__element = &$__iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00572                                 if( strcmp($__element->id, $element->id) === 0){
00573                                         $__element = $element;
00574                                         return $__element;
00575                                 }
00576                         }
00577                         return NULL;
00578                 }else{
00579                         return NULL;
00580                 }
00581         }
00582 
00590         public function &delete(POMElement $element = NULL){
00591                 $__iterator = $this->children->listIterator();
00592                 if($element->id !== NULL){
00593                         while($__iterator->hasNext()){
00594                                 $__element = &$__iterator->getNextNodeValueByReference();
00595                                 if( strcmp($__element->id, $element->id) === 0){
00596                                         return $this->children->remove($__element);
00597                                 }
00598                         }
00599                         return false;
00600                 }else{
00601                         return false;
00602                 }
00603         }
00604 
00610         public function toString(){
00611                 $this->sync();
00612                 return $this->text;
00613         }
